Package it.polimi.ingsw.messages.gamemessages

Interface GameMessage

All Superinterfaces:
Message, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActivateCharacterCardMessage, ApplyCharacterCardEffectMessage1, ApplyCharacterCardEffectMessage2, ChosenCardMessage, ChosenCloudMessage, EndTurnMessage, MoveMotherNatureMessage, MoveStudentToChamberMessage, MoveStudentToIslandMessage, SetClanCharacterMessage
public interface GameMessage extends Message
The GameMessage interface contains the method that performs a move on the game, and it is implemented by all game related messages

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Message
    performMove(String nickname, GameInterface game)
    The method performMove, calls the method that corresponds to the message

    Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.ingsw.messages.Message

    getMessage

  • Method Details

    • performMove

      Message performMove(String nickname, GameInterface game) throws WrongGamePhaseException, ExpertModeNotEnabledException, WrongPlayerException, NonExistingPlayerException, NotValidMoveException, NotValidIndexException, WrongTurnPhaseException
      The method performMove, calls the method that corresponds to the message
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player who performs the move
      game - the game on which to perform the move
      Returns:
      the answer to be sent to the client
      Throws:
      WrongGamePhaseException - when the action is not valid in this game phase
      ExpertModeNotEnabledException - when one tries to perform an expert action on a non-expert game
      WrongPlayerException - when a player tries to make a move when it is not their turn
      NonExistingPlayerException - when there is no player with the given nickname in the game
      NotValidMoveException - when the move is not valid according to the game rules
      NotValidIndexException - when one tries to perform an action giving an ndex of on an island or a cloud that does not exist
      WrongTurnPhaseException - when the action is not valid in this turn phase
